title: taruNam IdammA dayai
sahitya:
taruNam IdammA dayai seidu enrum karuNai tandiDavE vara vENDum inidAna


anupallavi

  tiru madurai nagaril dinam dinam arasALum perumAL sundaranin virundE bhava marundE


caraNam    perumAl sOdariyE para veLiyil enrum irundE iyangiDum arum perum paruvamum
parindiDum tirukkaN allavO siriyEn endanaiyum pArAi enrum aruL tArAi
